c74object.name: o.note2vpr
c74object.digest: Convert note to virtual pitch and register
c74object.description: MIDI conversion utility. Transforms input notes into virtual pitch numbers {0..11/C..B} and octave number.

inlet.description: Convert input midi notes into virtual pitch, from 0 to 11 (C to B), and octave/register number. Depending on the central C (either C3 or C4).

outlet.description: Virtual pitch refers to the note name, regardless of its octave. So any C note will always be "0" and any D note will always be "2", regardless of their octave.
Note octave, depending on the central C (either C3 or C4).

method.name: int/float
method.description: Converts input notes into virtual pitch and octave/register number. The input number format (int/float) is maintained through the output.

attribute.name: center
attribute.description: Set the central C (either C3 or C4). This is not case-sensitive. (default = C3)

c74object.discussion: To convert back to "regular" note values use o.vpr2note.

entry.name: int
entry.description:
Out left outlet: virtual pitch, from C to B {0..11}.
Out right outlet: octave/register number, according to a central C.
